newsitem.title: USA: May Dept files for $500 mln shelf debt.
newsitem.headline: May Dept files for $500 mln shelf debt.

text.p: May Department Stores Co filed a shelf registration Friday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to $500 million in debt securities.

Net proceeds will be used to retire a portion of its outstanding commercial paper and other short-term debt, finance operations and for general corporate purposes, including stock repurchases, investments or possible acquisitions, the company said.
No underwriters were listed in the filing.
